mapper.select: SELECT cd.`code` AS CODE, cd.`parent_code` AS parentCode, cd.`pack_level` AS packLevel, cd.`batch_code` AS batchCode, cd.`product_id` AS productId, cd.`status` AS status, p.`name` AS productName, p.`pcs_per_ctn` AS pcsPerCtn, p.`ctn_per_plt` AS ctnPerPlt, p.`spec` AS spec, q.`qty` AS qty FROM `code_data` cd, product p, `query_report` q WHERE cd.`product_id` = p.`id` AND q. CODE = p.code AND cd.`code` = #{code}
